Package ch.cmbntr.eventbus

An event bus.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Handler
    An event handler.
    Handlers.EventDelivery
    Event delivery.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EventBus
    Asynchronous event bus, which is compatible with the Guava EventBus (i.e. it uses Subscribe, AllowConcurrentEvents and DeadEvent).
    Handlers
    Event handling.
    Handlers.EventAndTargets
    Pair of an event and targets.
    Handlers.EventHandler
    An event handler.
